short-description: Affiliate platform for streamers specialized in online casino bonuses and box opening.
description: Affiliate website developed for streamer vitapvp, showcasing the best bonuses and benefits from partner casinos with redirection to affiliate links.
long-description:
ShadowBonus is an affiliate platform developed for streamer vitapvp, designed to clearly and attractively present the best bonuses and benefits from partner online casinos.

The project focuses on the essentials: a clean interface that highlights partner offers and facilitates conversion to affiliate links. Developed with React and styled-components, the site prioritizes ease of use and conversion efficiency.

Our approach focused on a smooth user experience allowing vitapvp's viewers to quickly discover the best available offers and easily access partner platforms.
